title: 62 minute queue
body:
Riot fix client, that is all I ask for

I was playing a game where I was carried around by tahm kench since he was supporting mid lane and then when I exit it says that I was afk for the majority of the match even though I was being trolled and gave all my farm to tahm after he saved my life, anyway I wait out my 20 minute leaver buster, lock in button gets frozen in champ select even though everything works, I didn't receive an afk warning even once, eventually I was returned to queue where the client told me to visit riot support . com because there was a queue issue and gave me a 20 minute penalty for no reason ( like when you dodge a ranked game so you can do anything in the client except load into queue ) then once the timer was up I thought that I could load in immediately but now I have just waited until the 62'nd minute of my queue punishment just to play one game

A similar thing happened to me a month ago when I played zero cs klepto rengar top but was inelegible to earn loot due to afk behaviours...
